detail_desc: Trousers in woven fabric with a high, pleated paper bag waist, decorative buttons at the sides, zip fly and button and tapered legs with creases.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist. Unlined.
Trousers in jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets and double-layered legs in different colours.
Shorts in cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-on bow at the top and an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a relaxed style with an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
A-line skirt in lacquered jersey with a high waist, D-ring belt and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft loose knit with a deep V-neck, low dropped shoulders and a shorter front with a twisted knot detail at the top.
Fitted fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and thumbholes at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Sleeveless maxi dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.
Calf-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, belt with a metal buckle, side pockets, zip fly and straight, wide legs.
V-neck top in ribbed jersey made from a soft modal and cotton blend with spaghetti shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Small backpack in imitation leather with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Lined. Size 11x21x26 cm.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim. Regular waist with elastication at the back, a zip fly and button, and wide, tapered legs.
Boxy T-shirt in soft fabric with gently dropped shoulders.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide, ribbed trim at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and metal fastener at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft jacquard knit with dropped shoulders, long kimono sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and no fasteners. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Braided elasticated fabric belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width approx. 3.5 cm.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.

Fully lined, ribbed swimsuit with a fixed belt to accentuate the waist. Square neckline at the front and a deeper square neckline at the back. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.
Boxy puffer jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Jersey T-shirt with decorative seams and short sleeves with raw edges.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Wellingtons with a relief pattern and small appliqué on the shaft. The shaft has a canvas edge with a drawstring and plastic fastener. Reflective strip at the top. Pile linings and chunky soles.
Short blouse in patterned chiffon with a V-neck, sewn-in knot detail at the front and long sleeves that are crinkled at the top and elasticated at the cuffs.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with long sleeves. Overlocked edges at the neck, cuffs and hem.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high paper bag waist, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and wide, tapered legs.

Soft, non-wired lace bras that give the bust a natural shape and light support with mesh-lined cups and elastication under the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Sleeveless tunic in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, inset lace trims at the top, a seam under the bust and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, pleat at the back and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.

Bomber jacket in a wool blend with a pile-lined collar and zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a button, concealed side pockets, an inner pocket,and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.
Straight T-shirt in soft, airy viscose slub jersey with a deep V-neck.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.

Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and flap leg pockets with a tab and D-rings. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Sweatpants with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with a high, wrapover funnel collar with a decorative drawstring at the front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Metal hair clips with spooky appliqués in shimmering and glittery fabric.
Patterned microfibre tights with an elasticated waist.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 35x170 cm.
Cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Suede trainers with lacing at the front and a padded top edge. Mesh linings, leather insoles and rubber soles.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Long dress in patterned, lightly crêped chiffon made partly from recycled polyester. Double yoke with decorative gathers, a draped V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top, and short cap sleeves. Smocked waist and an asymmetric skirt with a flounced trim and jersey lining.
Shimmering tights with an elasticated waist. 20 denier.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Trousers in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen. High waist with concealed elastication and slim legs with contrasting ribbon embroidery down the sides and a concealed zip at the hems.
Elastic bracelet with large plastic beads.
Aviator style glasses with metal frames and clear lenses.
Metal earrings in various designs, 4 pairs with faceted sparkly stones. Length from 0.4-6.6 cm.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in stripe-print cotton jersey with a text print and striped ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, double-layered wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in cotton piqué with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sandals in imitation leather with a decorative appliqué on the front, ankle strap with a hook and loop tab and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Long dress in viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, short cap sleeves with ribbed trims and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Fancy dress cape in jersey with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck. Unlined.
Blouse in a jacquard weave with pleats, a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and ties at the side. Short dolman sleeves and a seam at the waist.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Coat in a woven wool blend with a hood and concealed press-studs down the front. Tie belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
